pages.text: This improved stabilizer is inhabited by a $(thing)Djinni$() that supports the dimensional matrix in keeping the storage dimension stable, thus allowing to store even more items.

pages.heading: Infusion
pages.ingredients: $(li)1x $(item)Storage Stabilizer Tier 1 $()$(li)1x $(item)Silver Block $()$(li)1x $(item)Ghast Tear$() $(li)2x $(item)Spirit Attuned Gem $()
